properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Omany ny fanilo,
Andao hiakatra !
Moa renao ve ry mpino ?
'Ndry ny Mpampakatra !

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Avy 'lay nantenaina,
Mihir√† Hosana !
He! tonga ny maraina,
Derao , Haleloia !
Derao , Haleloia !

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Indreny ny anjely
Be voninahitra
Hamory 'zay niely,
Handova lanitra.
Avy 'lay nantenaina,sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tazano ! Iry ny Tompo,
Mpandresy lehibe !
Nietry mba hanompo
Fa izao nasandratra e!
Avy 'lay nantenaina,sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Faingana, Jeso tia,
Miandry Anao 'zahay,
Miantso hoe: << Avia >>,
Amen ! handray anay.
Avy 'lay nantenaina,sns.
